emuInput.TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Mayor Thomas J. Gallagher seated at desk reappointing Rev. Charles H. Foggie to Housing Authority of City of Pittsburgh, with Joseph A. Goney, Everett Utterback Sr., Madeline Sharpe Foggie, Alfred Tronzo, Rev. Foggie, and Frances Johns standing behind him, in Office of the Mayor, City County Building
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper October 31, 1959, pg. 32, reads: "Rev. Foggie Reappointed - The Rev. Charles H. Foggie, second from right, of Wesley Center AME Zion Church, and president of the Pittsburgh branch of the National Association for the Advancement of Colored People, was reappointed to the Housing Authority of the City of Pittsburgh by Mayor Thomas J. Gallagher, seated, Tuesday. Besides Mrs. Foggie, others attending, who are all Authority members were, left to right: Joseph A. Goney, secretary; Atty. Everett E. Utterback, chief legal counsel; Alfred Tronzo, administrator; and Frances Johns, treasurer. The Rev. Mr. Foggie, who has completed five years of service, is assistant to the secretary and the treasurer. - Harris photo."
